data.message: Hello Facebook, Please allow us to see who shares our photos. If the photo belongs to us we should have be able to see who shares it. I rarely make "public" post but it is a way my husband who does not have a facebook account can see a linked post.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Anita. We truly appreciate all feedback from the community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2orb8rK. -Jon
